COMMAND_PING_DESCRIPTION: Checks the current status and latency.
PING_LATENCY: This message took {{latency}}ms to send. All seems OK!
COMMAND_ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: Returns information and statistics about the bot.
COMMAND_DICE_OPTION_0_DESCRIPTION: The amount of sides on the die (defaults to 6; maximum is 120).
DICE_RESULT: You rolled a {{sides}}-sided die that landed on {{roll}}.
COMMAND_ANIMAL_DESCRIPTION: Sends a random picture of a specified type of animal.
COMMAND_ANIMAL_OPTION_0_DESCRIPTION: The kind of animal to get a random picture of.
COMMAND_ANIMAL_SUBCOMMAND_0_OPTION_0_DES: Sends a random picture of a cat.
COMMAND_ANIMAL_SUBCOMMAND_0_OPTION_1_DES: Sends a random picture of a dog.
COMMAND_ANIMAL_SUBCOMMAND_0_OPTION_2_DES: Sends a random picture of a fox.
